sections.title: Welcome to Your Gateway to the World
sections.subtitle: Experience the Skyport Difference
sections.name: hero-section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to Skyport International, where every journey begins. Experience unparalleled service, world-class amenities, and seamless travel experience. Book your flight today!

images.name: Skyport Terminal Overview
images.description: A stunning aerial view of Skyport International's main terminal.

sections.title: About Skyport International
sections.subtitle: Commitment to Excellence
sections.name: about-section
sections.label: About
sections.content: Skyport International has been a beacon for travelers worldwide since 1980. Our commitment to excellence and innovation ensures a seamless journey from start to finish.

images.name: History Showcase
images.description: Historical images showcasing the evolution of Skyport International over the years.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: What We Offer
sections.name: services-section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
1. **Lounge Services** - Relax in comfort before your flight.  
2. **Fast Track Security** - Speed through security with our VIP services.  
3. **Baggage Services** - Ensure your luggage travels safely and efficiently.

images.name: Lounge Icon
images.description: Icon representing the lounge services at Skyport.

sections.title: Travel Experiences
sections.subtitle: See What Awaits You
sections.name: gallery-section
sections.label: Gallery
sections.content: Explore our facilities through our gallery. Discover the breathtaking architecture and modern amenities that make traveling through Skyport unforgettable.

images.name: Lounge Area
images.description: A photo of Skyport's luxurious lounge area.

sections.title: Our Team
sections.subtitle: Meet the People Behind the Scenes
sections.name: team-section
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our professional and dedicated team is always ready to assist. Learn more about the individuals who ensure your journey is smooth.

images.name: John Doe - Airport Manager
images.description: The Airport Manager, John Doe, at Skyport International.

sections.title: Latest News from Skyport
sections.subtitle: Stay Updated

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: We're Here to Help
sections.name: contact-section
sections.label: Contact
sections.content: For inquiries and assistance, please contact us via phone at (555) 012-3456 or email at info@skyportintl.com. Our support team is available 24/7.

images.name: Airport Location Map
images.description: Map showing the location of Skyport International.

sections.title: Have Questions?
sections.subtitle: Find Your Answers Here
sections.name: faq-section
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**Q**: What are the check-in times?  
**A**: Check-in opens 3 hours and closes 1 hour before departure for international flights.  

**Q**: Is there Wi-Fi available at the airport?  
**A**: Yes, complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

sections.title: Plan Your Visit
sections.subtitle: Navigate Your Way
sections.name: travel-planning-section
sections.label: Plan Your Visit
sections.content: Discover transportation options, find terminal maps, and get tips for a smooth trip. We've curated information to make your visit to Skyport International smooth and stress-free.

images.name: Terminal Map
images.description: Detailed map of Skyport International terminals.

sections.title: Stay Connected
sections.subtitle: Be Part of Our Community
sections.name: newsletter-section
sections.label: Newsletter
sections.content: Join our newsletter to receive exclusive travel tips and airport news straight to your inbox.

sections.title: Skyport Connections
sections.subtitle: Explore Our Network

sections.label: Destinations
sections.content: Skyport connects you to over 150 destinations worldwide. Explore our network and find your next adventure.
